SEE WHY TEAMS
GREPTILE
[ SHIP FASTER ]
Your second pair of eyes.

Greptile automatically reviews PRs in GitHub and GitLab with full context of your codebase.

See Greptile in action

[IN-LINE COMMENTS]

Get context-aware comments on your PRs

In-line comments to identify bugs, antipatterns, security issues, and more.

[CUSTOM CONTEXT]

Describe your coding standards in English

Tell Greptile about your team's best practices, Greptile will enforce them across PRs.

[PR SUMMARIES]

Quickly understand PRs with AI-generated summaries

Get mermaid diagrams, file-by-file breakdowns, and confidence scores for every PR.

[LEARNING]

Greptile learns by reading your comments

Greptile infers your team's coding standards by reading every engineer's comments on PRs.

[ 30+ LANGUAGES SUPPORTED ]
Full Codebase Context

Greptile generates a detailed graph of your codebase and understands how everything fits together. Better understanding of your codebase = more bugs caught.

Learn more
[ CUSTOM CONTEXT ]
Your house, your rules.

Greptile is better when personalized to your team.

Write a rule or point to markdown file

Write a rule in English or point Greptile to a markdown file with your team's best practices.

Scope where the rule should apply

Apply rules and context to specific repositories, file paths, or code patterns.

Track rule effectiveness and usage overtime

Analyze whether rules are being used by Greptile and actioned by the team.

Explore Custom Context
[ LEARNING ]
Introducing Learning.

Greptile learns your team's coding standards by reading every engineer's PR comments, and learns what types of comments your team finds useful by tracking üëç/üëé reactions.

Self-Hosted Deployment

SOC 2 Compliant

[ TESTIMONIALS ]
From Developers That Use Greptile

See what developers are saying about their experience with Greptile

‚ÄúWe've tried more code review tools than I can count. Greptile outperforms them all by a mile. Honestly the only AI reviewer that doesn't annoy the shit out of me.‚Äù

James
CTO ‚Ä¢ Brex

‚ÄúWe've been impressed by Greptile's code review quality. It's tightened our feedback loops, improved consistency, and freed up engineers to focus on higher-level design and architecture.‚Äù

Mark
Eng. Manager ‚Ä¢ WorkOS

‚ÄúGreptile helps the team do their best work. It levels everybody up and helps ensure that we're all proud of our code‚Äù

Anirudh
Tech Lead ‚Ä¢ Browserbase

‚ÄúGreptile is one of the most impressive AI code review tools I've used. It's right up there with Cursor in terms of changing the game.‚Äù

Martin
CTO ‚Ä¢ PurpleFish

‚ÄúI'm thankful for the things Greptile catches in my pull requests.‚Äù

Hahnbee
CTO ‚Ä¢ Mintlify

‚ÄúGreptile has been the first AI code review tool I've used that actually provides useful feedback on PRs. It's catching issues that human reviewers easily miss and giving senior-level suggestions to boot‚Äù

Chase
CTO ‚Ä¢ RollCredits

‚ÄúTook me a year, but I finally signed up -- wow, Greptile's code reviews are very good. Been using this for a few weeks now, the team is very responsive! Highly recommended!‚Äù

Chris
CTO ‚Ä¢ Risotto

‚ÄúTook just 15 min to do the setup and it's been a game-changer. It catches small bugs that could easily slip through in big PRs and speeds up our release cycle. ‚Äù

Harish
CTO ‚Ä¢ Flaire

[ FAQ ]
Frequently Asked Questions

Your question not answered here?

Contact Us
How does Greptile pricing work?

Code reviews are $30 per developer per month. Chat is a fixed monthly subscription. API pricing is per request. See our pricing page for more details.

Can Greptile be self-hosted?

Yes, you can self-host Greptile in your AWS environment and even use your own LLM providers for added flexibility.

Are there free trials or discounts available for Greptile?

Greptile offers free usage for qualified open source projects and significant discounts for pre-Series A startups. Contact us to check your eligibility.

What programming languages does Greptile support?

Greptile fully supports Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Elixir, Java, C, C++, C#, Swift, PHP, and Rust. Most other languages are supported with slightly lower response quality.

Is Greptile compatible with GitLab?

Yes, Greptile integrates seamlessly with GitLab in addition to GitHub.

Can I use Greptile's API for my own product?

Yes, we offer discounted bulk pricing for API use. Please contact us at support@greptile.com for more information.

What is AI code review?
AI code review learns your codebase and applies repository context to analyze pull requests, catching syntax, logic, and style issues and suggesting fixes. Learn more in our AI code review guide
.
